! cue cmd baddisplay
stdout 'terminating because of errors'
cmp stderr cmd_baddisplay.out

-- cmd_baddisplay.out --
text: conflicting values 42 and string (mismatched types int and string):
    ./task_tool.cue:6:9
    tool/cli:4:9
-- task.cue --
package home
message: "Hello world!"

-- task_tool.cue --
package home

command baddisplay: {
	task display: {
		kind: "print"
		text: 42
	}
}
